prompts.question: Describe the time, weather, environment, objects in JSON, and each value should be single string and less than 20 words. Here are examples: `{"time": "daytime", "weather": "overcast, wet road", "environment": "urban parking lot", "objects": "cars, pedestrians, traffic signs, trees, brick buildings"}`, `{"time": "night", "weather": "clear sky", "environment": "suburban street", "objects": "cars, cyclist, tram trucks, trees"}`, `{"time": "dusk", "weather": "cloudy", "environment": "street intersection", "objects": "pedestrian crossing, traffic lights, road signs, tall buildings, bushes"}`
Describe objects in this image within about 30 words.
